title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the slope

1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

dy dx | (−2,1)  = −(−2+1) 2(1+1) = 1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4D6F@

Tangent line: y=1+ 1 4 (x+2)
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the slope

1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

dy dx | (−2,1)  = −(−2+1) 2(1+1) = 1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4D6F@

Tangent line: y=1+ 1 4 (x+2)

1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

dy dx | (−2,1)  = −(−2+1) 2(1+1) = 1 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4D6F@

Tangent line: y=1+ 1 4 (x+2)
